name: Haunted Horror Midnight Madnes
description:
The dark forest near the highway is beautiful and the family horror is on a grand trip. Although the tour guide has narrated many horrible histories about the horror forest and the spooky house residing in the dark forest but that didn’t stop the horror family from travelling the dark forest fear house simulator. The escape game of scary family this time has 5 days and nights to finish the journey of the horror house residing in horror forest. The horror family house is a scary mystery game which
needs to be revealed and there are many horrible histories screaming about this spooky house with its spooky doors and rooms. The suspense games have a new variety of horror forest and its Goosebumps arising horror mansion oriented bogeyman horrible histories.

Oh no! The horror family has had an accident! The car of the family horror is completely destroyed and the survival horror game has begun! Out of the vehicle oriented engine mist there appeared a strange horror asylum spooky house bogeyman! It suddenly appeared out of nowhere near the haunted mansion of the creepy house in the horror forest. The forest zombie is one of the main reasons of horrible histories of the horror mansion asylum.

The forest is full of suspense escape games and more forest zombie accumulated in the spooky Goosebumps house in the territory of horror forest. The forest zombie has kidnapped the little favorite daughter of the horror family to the family’s horror. The survival horror game participant has to follow the tidbit guide messages from the good souls in the horror forest and reach the horror asylum spooky house to save the little scared girl.

You have to follow the Goosebumps
scary family suspense game guidelines and enter the spooky horror house mansion checking through all doors and rooms, tiptoeing through lobbies of he horror asylum silently. Make sure you don’t get seen by the forest zombie gang or awake the survival horror game creatures or bogeymen, else you yourself will become a captive of the creepy house horror asylum. Make it fast, duck and crawl through doors and rooms of the scary game Goosebumps giving spooky house.

The spooky horror asylum house of the 5 night’s survival horror game has very flexible escape game play with indulging controls. It makes use of health buttons along with touch controls for the suspense game fear house as a first person. Find the little girl kidnapped in the fear house of the scary family within 5 nights and days else she will turn into a forest zombie on the sixth night by the dawn.

How to play This Game
=Download the horror scary family forest survival horror game from your Apple store
=Select the child character
=The horror family meets an accident in the dark horror forest
=The forest zombie boogeyman appears infront of the car
=The little girl of the family horror is kidnapped
=Finish the 5 night escape mission by finding the little girl
=Follow the tidbit guidelines appearing on the screen
=Use onscreen controls to move through each doors and rooms
=Hide from the forest zombies in the fear house
=Avoid going near the bogeyman

FEATURES
=Dark forest survival horror game house simulation
=3 innocent little girl characters
=Highway horror forest environment
=Flexible and indulging on screen touch controls
=Family horror in the dark forest Escape game animation
=Creepy haunted mansion house background music effects
=Interesting realistic HD visual graphics
=5 days to escape the spooky house
